message.body: When do you think youll find yourself in the Phila area again?
Oh I dunno. Maybe end of August ;(
(1/2) Thats cool. I should be back in the area by then. Ill be gone from the 24th of july to 20 aug myself. Ill be in the yukon of all places! If i dont see
(2/2) the northern lights i will be pissed
(1/2) No. Ill be going up with the army. So i get pay! How cool is that? Im only a reservist so i get all the busy work like driving people around and gaurd
(2/2) duty while the regs do all the cool stuff. But still its a pretty sweet deal if you ask me.
Yeah. Pay !!!! Dam, I'm working a labor job this summer (cleaning out studios for the school). So. Not. Fun.
Does it pay well? Is it easy? A nice easy job that puts some coin in your pocket is good. No stress and you have some mony for fun

The pay isn't bad. It's not enough though. The girl I work with is a fucking cunt. She's Canadian actually. I wouldn't have a problem with it except I'm also taking a class. Do I can't put in enough hours to feel like I'm living large. But it's still feels like beautiful sweet summer.
Canadians can be stuck up rude jerks. I should know ive lived with them the past 7 years. No idea where that "sorry" stereotype came from.
So you clean up schools when the kids are gone? What kind of messes do little kids leave you? Im sure there are horrors.
